TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local defendingPlayer = Object():GetPlayerAttacked() local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ENCHANTMENT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_LAND ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_PLANESWALKER ) filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetController( defendingPlayer ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, defendingPlayer ) local numberOfTargets = filter:CountStopAt( 4 ) if numberOfTargets > 0 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetCount( numberOfTargets ) defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 0, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_ONE_OF_FOUR" )
if numberOfTargets > 1 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 1, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_TWO_OF_FOUR" ) end
if numberOfTargets > 2 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 2, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_THREE_OF_FOUR" ) end
if numberOfTargets > 3 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 3, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_FOUR_OF_FOUR" ) end
defendingPlayer:ChooseTargets( NO_VALIDATION, EffectDC():Make_Targets(1) ) end

local target_array = {} for i=0,3 do target_array[i] = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_NthCardPtr(i) end for i=0,3 do if target_array[i] ~= nil then local player = target_array[i]:GetPlayer() target_array[i]:Sacrifice(player) end end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: When Kozilek is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Quando Kozilek viene messo in un cimitero da qualsiasi zona, il suo proprietario rimescola il suo cimitero nel suo grimorio.
Wenn Kozilek von irgendwoher auf den Friedhof gelegt wird, mischt sein Besitzer seinen Friedhof in seine Bibliothek.
Quand Kozilek est mis dans un cimetière depuis n’importe où, son propriétaire mélange son cimetière à sa bibliothèque.
Cuando Kozilek vaya a un cementerio desde cualquier parte, su propietario baraja su cementerio en su biblioteca.
真実の解体者、コジレックがいずれかの領域からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、オーナーは自分の墓地を自分のライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
When Kozilek is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Когда Козилек попадает откуда-либо на кладбище, его владелец втасовывает свое кладбище в свою библиотеку.
Quando Kozilek é colocado num cemitério vindo de qualquer lugar, seu dono embaralha seu próprio cemitério em seu próprio grimório.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local owner = Object():GetOwner() if (owner ~= nil) then owner:MoveLocalZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD, ZONE_LIBRARY ) owner:ShuffleLibrary() end
